headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FREIDES, BARBARA GREENE

lead_paragraph: FREIDES--Barbara Greene, long time resident of Larchmont, NY, passed away peacefully February 1st, 2014. She was 78 years old. Barbara was born to Henry and Augusta Greene on November 25th, 1935, in Brooklyn, NY before moving to Kew Garden Hills and then Forest Hills for her teenage years and young adult years. She then settled in Mamaroneck and then Larchmont, NY. She was predeceased by her husband, Jack Freides, whom she married November 23rd, 1961. He died on March 1st, 2006. She is survived by her loving sister Sybil Goldman; sons Drew Freides and Randy (Judy) Freides; along with her two cherished grandchildren, Rebecca and Adam Freides. She was first and foremost a devoted wife and mother, but also worked as an accountant for over 50 years, until she retired only last year. Her passion was traveling the world, which took her to almost every continent. Contributions in lieu of flowers, can be made to the Westchester Jewish Center, 175 Rockland Ave, Mamaroneck, NY 10543.
